member.name: IDesktopWindowXamlSourceNative.AttachToWindow
member.summary: Attaches the current instance to a parent UI element in your desktop app that is associated with a window handle.
member.param: The window handle of the parent UI element in which you want to host a WinRT XAML control.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDesktopWindowXamlSourceNative.get_WindowHandle
member.summary: Gets the window handle of the parent UI element that is associated with the current instance.
member.param: On output, this parameter contains the window handle of the parent UI element that is associated with the current instance.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDesktopWindowXamlSourceNative
member.summary: Provides members you can use to attach a DesktopWindowXamlSource object that hosts a WinRT XAML control to a parent UI element in your desktop app.
